name: LID - Test Build
description:
LID is aiming to be a RPG Gacha Simulator.

A Gacha simulator that not only collects characters but also aims to develop their stories and expand the world they live in.

Note : LID v12 is a test build.  Please expect balancing issues and possible game breaking bugs present.

Made in RPG Maker MV.

Credits to all plugin creators that are featured in this game:

MAJOR PLUGINS : 

MOGHunter, Galv, Victor Sant, Yanfly.

MINOR PLUGINS: (To be updated)

Fogomax, Kaus, HIME, Landazar, FELSKI, DreamX, G.A.M Kertopermono.
